answers.answer: Hi,More than your sexual problem, you seem to be having some serious health issue, losing  38 pounds in a month with out any reason is not a joke. You need to consult a physician and get a general health check up done immediately. Probably a complete blood test will show what may be affecting your health. Check for both blood pressure and blood glucose as these are most probable causes. It may also  be due to stress or some other deficiency.You should not wait for the insurance to be available since an early diagnosis would help you to get back your health at much less cost and time frame.Good luck,Solace
You need a fasting blood sugar taken because you may have diabetes. Do that now. Once that has been ruled in or out post again and I may be able to help you further.

question: I have a hard time maintaining an erection..It makesMe self conscious.I obtain erection,but then it goes away...this has been bothering me for about a few months now...I am just starting a new job and do not have any health insurance yet...I am 39,I will turn 40 in july.I haven't had this problem before,just seemed to start recently...My new girlfriend gets dissapointed,expectedly...She loves a hard,strong erection...I cannot perform for her....this is REALLY botherong me....I also have lost about 38 pounds within the last month without trying....I really need some help because this is REALLY affecting me,andnow it seems depression is starting to enter into the picture...I obtain an erection,but then it goes away...I have tried some over the counter stuff,like LIDIDO MAX from walgreens,but doesn't help much...I am also taking a Multi vitamin ftom GNC for verility and prostate health...nothing seems to work...how do I fix this with LOW income and no insurance?? Can SOMEONE please help me??
title: MAJOR ERECTION PROBLEMS!
